price: (7) Their eyes humbled, they will emerge from the graves as if they were locusts spreading,
arabic: خُشَّعًا أَبۡصَٰرُهُمۡ يَخۡرُجُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡأَجۡدَاثِ كَأَنَّهُمۡ جَرَادٞ مُّنتَشِرٞ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: khushaʿan abṣāruhum yakhrujūna mina al-ajdāthi ka-annahum jarādun muntashirun
